member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSTCHQ.TCHQ_QueryProcessor.UpdateResponseResult(System.Int64,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the RESPONSE_RESULT and time columns. The WEb Service Layer will call back this method after calling processquery and checking if the client is still connected
member.param: Query ID , key to row in log table
true=client was still connected, false= client was not connected

member.name: T:IRU.RTS.WSTCHQ.CWQuerys
member.summary: CWQuerys is called to retrieve the CW Carnet Data. This data is returned in a Decrypted Hash Table.
